document.title: In the Name of the Spirit
document.abstract: The authors argue that naming experiences "spiritual" is important to an expanded understanding of goals, struggles, and success in their writing center practice.
document.publication-title: The Journal of the Assembly for Expanded Perspectives on Learning

field.name: acknowledgements
field.value:
Lynn Briggs is an Associate Professor of English, director of the Writers’ Center and graduate program in Rhetoric and Composition at Eastern Washington University.
Fred Schunter is finishing his MA in TESOL at Eastern Washington University while racing motorcycles professionally.
Ray Melvin is a Responder at the Writers’ Center, a graduate of Eastern Washington University’s MFA program, a poet and popular local musician.
